messages.subject: Re: Re: Greg Brown
messages.msgSnippet: ***Kate, I havn t heard of his children s songs,  I ll have to check into it. When is the Yosemite concert? Does he do it every year? I also love Morning
messages.messageBody:
***Kate,
I havn't heard of his children's songs, I'll have to check into it.
When is the Yosemite concert?
Does he do it every year?

I also love Morning Coffee and Dream Cafe, to me his concerts are so
fun, his side comments are
hilarious.

Kelli***

The concert in Yosemite is a 4 day festival. There are 2 of them during
the year spring and summer. It's called the Strawberry Music Festival
is the web site is www.strawberrymusic.com
It's so much fun! Lots of things for kids to do and their parents.
Greg Brown hasn't performed there since 1998, and I just went to the
site to see if the line up for next year was up yet and it's not, so I
don't know if he'll be back this year.
The funny this that Arlo Guthrie perfomed last year - almost made up for
not having Greg Brown there.

Kate
who's only a little musical but is raising children with their father's
musical abilities
